# Filipe Cavalcanti

Hi! I am an Economist specialized in data analysis and public policy evaluation.

I am interested in topics within applied microeconomics, particularly those involving health and labor economics.

I work at [IPEA](https://www.ipea.gov.br/portal/). I am a PhD Student at [FGV EESP](https://eesp.fgv.br/).

Contact me: [filipe.mtsc\@gmail.com](mailto:filipe.mtsc@gmail.com)

Follow me on [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/flp.bsky.social).
